form.LN:
Obliko
beside
lahko uporabljamo pri 1. pomenu.

sense.def:
Besides
ali
beside
včasih pomeni dodatno, zraven nečesa drugega.

seg.quote: What languages do you know besides English?
He needed so much else besides.
Thomas was the only blond in the family, beside the mother.

sense.def:
Z besedo
besides
navedemo dodaten poudarek ali razlog.

seg.quote: Would these figures prove anything? And besides, who keeps such statistics?
